snippet: Congress should support a proposal in President Obama’s 2016 budget that would close a loophole that takes advantage of G.I. Bill recipients.
abstract: Editorial urges Congress to support Pres Obama in closing loophole in federal law that allows for-profit colleges to exploit veterans' GI Bill benefits, proposal that is included in 2016 budget; argues that closing loophole would be first step in cleaning up industry that has long history of deceptive or illegal practices.
lead_paragraph: Congress should support a proposal in President Obama’s 2016 budget that would close a loophole that takes advantage of G.I. Bill recipients.

headline.print_headline: When Colleges Use Veterans as Pawns
headline.main: When Colleges Use Veterans as Pawns
